sentences.sentence: It is possible—if statistically extremely unlikely—that Steel could be born a "short sleeper" with an unusual body clock, says sleep expert Dr. Sophie Bostock.
sentences.translation: 尽管从统计学上来说极不可能，但斯蒂尔有可能天生是个“短睡眠者”，拥有一个不寻常的生物钟。

sentences.sentence: I've always been a light sleeper.
I'm a very light sleeper and I can hardly get any sleep at all.
sentences.translation: 我是个睡觉非常轻的人，几乎一点儿也睡不着。
